name: Web Google Drive
description: Google Drive is an online cloud storage drive. User can create, share and cooperate all sorts of files. It has powerful searching and revise track recording functions. Meanwhile, user can share file or folder, and it is integrated with multiple Google services.

en_US.description: Google Drive is an online cloud storage drive. User can create, share and cooperate all sorts of files. It has powerful searching and revise track recording functions. Meanwhile, user can share file or folder, and it is integrated with multiple Google services.
en_US.name: Web Google Drive

zh_CN.description: 谷歌云端硬盘是一个在线云存储服务网盘，可以通过它进行创建、分享、协作各种类型的文件，具有强大的搜索、跟踪修订记录功能，同时还可以共享文件或文件夹，整合Google多项服务。
zh_CN.name: 谷歌云端硬盘网页版
